bill.title: State Parole Board; require Governor to appoint an executive director for.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 47-7-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Governor Shall Appoint An Executive Director For The State Parole Board; To Provide That The Salary Of Such Director Shall Be Determined By The State Personnel Board; To Remove The Requirement That The Governor Appoint A Chairman Of The Board; To Provide That Parole Board Members Shall Not Receive A Salary But Shall Receive Per Diem And Travel Expenses; To Extend The Date Of Repeal On This Section From July 1, 2012, To July 1, 2015; To Amend Sections 47-5-26, 47-5-28 And 47-7-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.
